content:
# I successfully extracted 1 additional iron plate from the new furnace, bringing my total to 3 iron plates in the inventory. 
# The furnace still has 1 iron ore remaining, and my current inventory is as follows:
# - 5 coal
# - 5 stone
# - 3 iron ore
# - 3 iron plates
# - 5 iron gear wheels

# Since I have 3 iron plates now, I will proceed to smelt the last remaining iron ore in the furnace to maximize production. 
# I will insert the last iron ore into the furnace for smelting.

insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, new_furnace, quantity=1)  # Insert the last iron ore into the furnace for smelting

# After adding the iron ore, I will check the furnace status to ensure it's processing correctly.
print(f"New Furnace status after adding remaining resources: {inspect_inventory(new_furnace)}")  # Check the contents of the new furnace
print(f"Updated Inventory after adding resources: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Verify the inventory after adding resources
